[Teacher]: ! Yes, I am an avid sports enthusiast and try to stay physically active. I play soccer and basketball regularly, and also enjoy hiking and biking. I've also been trying to get more into rock climbing lately. It's a great way to challenge myself and build strength and endurance. Do you have a favorite sport or activity that you enjoy? I'm not really competitive, but I love the social aspect of team sports. There's nothing like being part of a team and working together towards a common goal. Plus, it's a great way to make new friends and meet people with similar interests. Have you ever joined a recreational sports team or tried a new activity with a group of friends? What I like most about sports and physical activity is the

They are as playful as ever, always running around the house, chasing each other, and getting into mischief. They are my constant companions and I love spending time with them. I love watching them play, their little meows, and the way they always curl up in my lap for cuddles. They are truly my babies. I'm a lucky person to have such wonderful pets. teacher_turns.text: ! I was at a concert once that was really special to me. I don't really know why, but it was just such a great feeling. I'm really hoping to relive that feeling when I see my favorite artist live again.  Music has a way of evoking strong emotions and memories, and it's wonderful to have a favorite artist or concert experience that brings back happy memories. Do you have a favorite type of music or artist that you always come back to?  What a wonderful topic! Music has a way of connecting us to our emotions, memories, and experiences. It's great to hear that you have a special concert experience that you cherish. Reliving those feelings can be a great way to recapture the magic of a particular time

STARTER: Do you celebrate any holidays with your family? Are there any special traditions or funny stories from past celebrations?
text:
[Starter]: Do you celebrate any holidays with your family? Are there any special traditions or funny stories from past celebrations?
[Student]: Do I have a cousin who lives in this house and is very fond of me_Spectator_ The last one here on Earth was written by Mr Hasnips son Jack Martin after he heard the story in his own room that night at the orphanage at New York City_Growler_ _Señorita Cavanaugh_ I am proud to hear about it now Ive not seen anything like it myself but I know how you feel when you are on parade
[Teacher]: and the crowd is watching you like your life depends on it. _Hailey_ It would be good to have some sense of history and tradition in our daily lives especially if we are surrounded by so much noise and chaos. _Winner_ One of the stories that stands out in my mind is the time my grandfather used to make us have a family dinner every Sunday afternoon. It was always a special occasion because he would cook his famous beef stew and we would have to wear our Sunday best. It was a time for us to come together and talk about our week. _Mrs. Kevan_ What's the power of family ties, I ask you? For me, family is what I'm left with after all my children have grown up
[Student]: together since they were born You see everything helps me and I believe that makes me happy Mrs I love mothers sake said the widow sadlymothers sake She smiled as she kissed her sister softly without speaking to anyone else except herselfwhatever has happened can happen soon enough she had no friends if mother knew how hard it seems to take care of me Please stop talking just onceplease let me think of something important to do
[Teacher]: and how I said I would do it but how can I do it when my husband is away You have to keep the conversation going I should say to you what happened to my husband last night My sister and I had a long conversation over the phone and she told me that my husband had run into an accident and I was devastated I just couldn't stop thinking about him and wondering if he would come back to me That I had to see him again and that I just had to know if he was okay Well I didn't wait very long before I packed my bags and decided to go see him at the hospital I left the house without telling my family and without taking anything with me but the clothes I was wearing It was the most difficult thing I left behind
